Detailed Description

Version A of the polygon filler. This is the basic implementation.

bool PolygonVersionA::init (  unsigned int  aWidth,
unsigned int  aHeight
) 
 

Initializer.

aWidth and aHeight define the maximum output size for the filler. The filler will output to larger bitmaps as well, but the output will be cropped.

bool PolygonVersionA::isSupported (  BitmapData::BitmapFormat  aFormat  )  [protected]
